query: query GetForecast($latitude: String!, $longitude:String!) { forecast(latitude: $latitude, longitude: $longitude) { detailed } }
query GetAlerts($state: String!) { alerts(state: $state) { severity description instruction } }

query GetAllWeatherData($latitude: String!, $longitude:String!, $state: String!) { forecast(latitude: $latitude, longitude: $longitude) { detailed } alerts(state: $state) { severity description instruction } }
